inicio.description_one: Recent graduate of the career in web development Full Stack Developer, with greater affinity to the frontend, I am currently looking for new challenges in companies and / or projects where I can contribute with my knowledge in web development and others.
inicio.description_two: I have been building my teamwork experience from the SCRUM methodology, developing from the frontend, backend and databases.
inicio.description_three: I have a bachelor's degree in biology, interests in natural history, knowledge in VBA Excell and music studies applied to piano.

services.title: Services
services.containt_titel: Welcome to the services section. As a web developer, I offer a wide range of services to help companies and organizations achieve their online goals.
services.first_first_contain: Creation of customized and unique website designs that reflect the brand's identity.
services.first_second_contain: Creation of customized web applications that meet specific customer needs.
services.first_third_contain: Complete website creation services from 0, from planning to implementation.
services.first_four_contain: SEO services to help clients increase their online visibility.
services.first_five_contain: Maintenance and support ensuring that clients' websites are up to date and running smoothly.
services.second_first_contain: Project management consulting for a software development team.
services.second_second_contain: IT project planning for your company.
services.third_first_contain: Dynamic tables in excel with macros according to the needs of your company or business.
services.third_second_contain: Design and publication of the corporate Brochure.
